::KitKat::

She looks at Time Bomb with atrange expression on her face. "You like 
pain?", she looks up in vain, "Oh boy. Look, you want pain, you got 
it.  Go to the lab and get the smallest brushes you can find and 
youand Land Mine can start scrubbing away at the walls right now.  
Start with this room. And make sure you get every inch of the walls 
clean too. Got it?"   She know had two pain loving bots to deal with 
in addition to all the other stuff.  She was having trouble with it.  
she had Megatron and the Vok thing to deal with.  She was hearing 
Phobia and for some strange reason, wanting to follow Phobia's 
advice. And now she had two bots who were obsesded with hurting each 
other on top of that.  She rolled her optics and walked to the 
entrance.  She was hoping to see Megatron return. But he wasn't.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> "It's just that we both thought you meant what you meant, and 
that's it. We
> have started to crave pain it has been inflicted to us for so long. 
I
> couldn't live without it. Scrubbbing walls with a toothbrush? Good! 
Muscle
> strain! Let me do that!" Time Bomb said...
